title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 Feb 28 FR [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Friday, 28 February 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On the Friday, February 28 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Jones breaks down Russia's decision to conduct various snap combat readiness drills, as the soviet nation confirms it has moved troops into Crimea. Alex also examines how Ukraine's "revolution" guided them right into the hands of the IMF, the globalist organization that wrote the playbook on how to loot nations of their wealth and infrastructure. 

On today's show, Alex speaks with world renowned relocation consultant, publisher of World Affairs Brief and author of Strategic Relocation: North American Guide to Safe Places, Joel Skousen about the developments in Crimea and Ukraine and how the global elite plan to pilfer the country dry. 

Alex also invites American political news commentator and editor-in-chief of The Daily Caller, Tucker Carlson to discuss why the public is tuning out mainstream news networks and turning in to real, unfiltered alternative and independent media.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
